title: Sergio Aquino
text: Sergio Aquino (born 21 September 1979 in <a href="Clorinda%2C%20Formosa">Clorinda, Formosa</a>) is a <a href="Paraguay">Paraguay</a>an <a href="association%20football">football</a> player of <a href="Argentine">Argentine</a> descent who currently plays for Paraguayan side <a href="Club%20Libertad">Club Libertad</a>. He has formerly played for <a href="Cerro%20Porte%C3%B1o">Cerro Porteño</a> and <a href="Club%20Olimpia">Olimpia of Asunción</a>. He has also represented the <a href="Paraguay%20national%20football%20team">Paraguayan national team</a> in international games between 2008 and the present day.
